front.title: RTP payload format for mU-law EMbedded Codec for Low-delay IP communication (UEMCLIP) speech codec

abstract.t: This document describes the RTP payload format of a mU-law EMbedded Coder for Low-delay IP communication (UEMCLIP), an enhanced speech codec of ITU-T G.711. The bitstream has a scalable structure with an embedded u-law bitstream, also known as PCMU, thus providing a handy transcoding operation between narrowband and wideband speech.
